name: pomp-circuits
description: ZK circuits for Private Onchain Messaging Protocol

scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:sender && npm run compile:group
scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/AnonymousSender.r1cs pot.ptau build/AnonymousSender_0000.zkey
scripts.setup:group: snarkjs groth16 setup build/GroupMember.r1cs pot.ptau build/GroupMember_0000.zkey
scripts.export:vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/AnonymousSender_final.zkey build/AnonymousSender_vkey.json
scripts.export:vkey:group: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/GroupMember_final.zkey build/GroupMember_vkey.json
scripts.export:sol: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/AnonymousSender_final.zkey build/AnonymousSenderVerifier.sol
